gui.overpowered.black_hole.not_allowed_i: Sorte huller er ikke tilladt i denne dimension.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.celestia: A unique gem made from 8 different types of gems. It is very durable.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.energy_c: A crystal that contains concentrated energy. Understanding this energy is the key to unlocking new technologies.
An Energy Crystal shattered into pieces. Although not as powerful as a whole Energy Crystal, they may still be useful.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.light_bl: A block made out of Celestial Gems. It is just as strong, and also emits light.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.void_cry: This crystal has similar properties to the Energy Crystal, but the energy contained within cannot be properly identified, and seems to defy the laws of physics. The discovery of the Void Crystal will lead to all new reality-bending technologies.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.null_blo: When the Null Block is placed into the world, it can never be interacted with again. You can only replace it with another block.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.celestia: Overmægtige værktøjer har 3 gange holdbarheden af diamantværktøjer. De miner også lidt hurtigere.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.void_too: Der arbejdes stadig på mørke værktøjer.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.scanning: This is a crafting item. Mainly used in machines that need to scan an object.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.destruct: This is a crafting item. Used whenever you need a high-energy laser to burn or destroy something.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.energy_s: A Power Regulator combined with a Scanning Laser. Uses a beam of energy fluctuations to affect an object externally.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.heavy_li: Emits a special light that is so fast and thick with energy, that you can actually feel it hitting you as you touch it. With enough pressure, this light won't let anything pass through it.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.matter_e: A Scanning Laser combined with a Matter/Energy Converter. This can scan objects and transform its atoms into energy or manipulate them in some other way.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.plasma: A concentrated form of energy in plasma state, kept together in a magnetic field.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.matter_e: By experimenting with the unique energy emitted from the Energy Crystal, you are able to create this, the special device that allows matter/energy manipulation.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.vacuum_c: A sealed container that keeps objects inside a vacuum.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.reinforc: A sealed vacuum container, reinforced with Titanium. Used when experimenting with objects that involve extreme pressures or stress.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.dimensio: Mysterious dimensional energy that is often encountered when traversing different dimensions. Prolonged exposure could disrupt your physical being.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.unimatte: A unique form of matter that is so dense, it is virtually indescructable.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.dimensio: The Dimensional Anchor, when kept in your inventory, will prevent you from traveling to other dimensions, and also protects you from a Black Hole.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.crystal_: Generatoren er den maskine, der genererer energi. Du kan indsætte energikrystaller, energikrystallskår eller en lysblok. Hver genererer energi i forskellige hastigheder.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.data_cab: Datakabel bruges i konstruktionen af portalen og fusionsenergistrukturen. Det bruges også i nogle håndværksopskrifter.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.gem_conv: Denne maskine kan konvertere en perle-type til en anden.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.inverter: Denne maskine omdanner energikrystaller til tomrumskrystaller og fungerer også i modsat retning.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.magic_in: Indsæt en bog og en perle, så får du en fortryllet bog, afhængigt af hvilken type perle du har brugt.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.identifi: Monstre vil undertiden droppe uidentificerede genstande. Brug denne maskine til at identificere dem.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.portal_c: Portalen kontrolpanel er den maskine, der genererer portalen. Det skal tilsluttes hovedportalrammen ved hjælp af datakabel.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.portal_f: Hovedportalrammen består af en ring af blokke, 5 blokke brede og 5 blokke høje. Hjørnerne og siderne skal være portalrammer, men de andre blokke derimellem kan enten være datakabel eller jernrammer.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.laser_ho: Dette er maskinen, der styrer, hvordan lasere fungerer. Du skal tilslutte lasere, der peger i den retning, du vil skyde. Indstil først afstanden, indsæt derefter den krævede energi. Aktiver med et rødt ledningssignal.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.laser: Dette er de lasere, der er knyttet til lasermaskiner.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.energy_s: Når den leveres med nok energi og aktiveres med et rødsten-signal, skaber dette en energibro herfra til en anden bromaskinblok. Du skal indsætte en linse med den ønskede farve, og mellemrummet mellem de to bromaskinblokke skal være fri for forhindringer.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.advanced: Indsæt malm i denne maskine, så producerer det dobbelt output, men det fungerer kun med malm.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.crystal_: Efter at have kørt et stykke tid, producerer denne maskine en perlekard. Kombiner 9 skær af samme type for at få en fuld perle.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.plasma_g: This machine generates plasma using High-Intensity Lasers and Energy Stabilizers. It's no surprise that this machine uses a lot of energy.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.matter_c: By carefully keeping a singularity inside a reinforced sealed container, and controlled by extreme magnetic fields, this machine allows you to compress objects to their absolute limits, as all matter is drawn towards the singularity.
gui.overpowered.jei_description.black_ho: Vær forsigtig med dette! Hvis du lægger dette ned, fjerner dette en stor del af din verden!
gui.overpowered.jei_description.fusion_c: En del af fusionsenergistrukturen. Dette er blokken i midten. Den skal indeholde en fusionskerne for at blive betragtet som gyldig.
En del af fusionsenergistrukturen. Du skal placere 6 af disse 5 blokke væk fra centrum i hver retning. Du skal bruge datakabel til at forbinde fusionskontrolenhederne til fusionenergikonverteren.
En del af fusionsenergistrukturen. Du skal lave 6 af disse og lægge en på hver fusionskontrolenhed, der peger mod fusionskammeret i midten.

En del af fusionsenergistrukturen. Bare sæt dette ned overalt, så skal du forbinde dette til hver af fusionskontrolenhederne ved hjælp af datakabel. Når den fulde struktur er færdig, skal du aktivere denne maskine med en rød ledning for at tænde den. Under kørsel genererer denne maskine energi.
gui.overpowered.portal_warning_message: §cPas på§r: Der er stadig nogle problemer med den ukendte dimension. Hvis du går der, er der en chance for, at du måske vises i luften og falder til din død. Vi anbefaler at gå ind i portalen i kreativ tilstand eller deaktivere portalen i konfigurationsfilen. Vi beklager dette, og vi håber at fikse det i en senere opdatering.
advancements.overpowered.root.title: Overpowered Technology
advancements.overpowered.all_gems.title: Saml ædelstene
advancements.overpowered.all_gems.descri: Saml alle typer perler der er nødvendige for at skabe den overmægtede perle
advancements.overpowered.fire_maximum_la: Brand en laser den maksimale afstand
advancements.overpowered.maximum_bridge_: Activate an Energy Suspension Bridge with the longest distance possible.
advancements.overpowered.identify_someth: Brug identifikationsmaskinen til at identificere noget
advancements.overpowered.portal.title: Ukendt dimension
advancements.overpowered.dimensional_flu: Find Dimensional Flux after entering the portal.
advancements.overpowered.inverter.title: Inverter
advancements.overpowered.fusion_structur: Lav alle de komponenter, der er nødvendige for at konstruere fusionsenergistrukturen
advancements.overpowered.world_destroyer: Brug et sort hul til at ødelægge en del af verden
advancements.overpowered.survivor.title: Survivor
advancements.overpowered.survivor.descri: Use a Dimensional Anchor to survive a Black Hole
advancements.overpowered.unimatter.title: Unimatter
advancements.overpowered.unimatter.descr: Use the Matter Compressor to obtain Unimatter.
